alert.note: Alert for Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 09 at 11:28PM PST until January 10 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Stevens Pass, Holden Village, and Stehekin. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact travel through Wednesday. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. For the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel
